short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All in one task tracker with google calendar integration

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
[BETA Release]

This app is a productivity tool that helps you keep track of your actual time spent on a task. Through the integration with google calendar, you can schedule and at the same time track how much time you are spending on a task using the in-built tracker. Often time, plans don't work out. Hence, this application helps you look into how much time you are actually spending on tasks as compared to simply scheduling your time.
